message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional opportunity.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To better align with your budget while still reflecting the true value of our product, I would like to propose a price of $12000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $11000 for the product.

I appreciate your offer, Bob. In order to find a mutually beneficial solution, I propose a final price of $11500 for the product. This reflects a compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget.
I understand your proposal, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $11000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $11250 for the product, which I believe is a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget.
